Hi this my Tron bike mix. 

How to play?

1. Vote for a map.
2. Pick Tron bike and start race.
3. You lose 5 sec if you destroy the bike.
4. Press left mouse when you have boost and press Special weapon to exit.
5. Every lap you race you get 1 point.
6. The winner will pick best weapon and pick a fight map.
7. I have made 4 race map and 5 fight maps. 

Tel me what you like and don't like and i will try fix next time. If you want me to make more race maps and some fight maps tel me, ore if you want make race map i can help.

have fun
